name: Space Balloon Thrusty Thing
description:
My entry into internet.game's One Button Game Jam

Your mission, should you choose not to ignore it completely, is to gather SPACE-BALLOONS within a confined arena, and hold on to them as best you can.

Your ship, the Jolly Frogger, doesn't have conventional controls and is only able to 'sync' with one of four, directional warp-zones within the arena (the stars should help you to navigate).

Press the button (mouse button, Spacebar, Ctrl, Alt, etc) to sync.

Hold the button down to thrust forward.

(You'll get the hang of it)

Bump into space-balloons to collect them.

The SCORE you receive works thus:

YOUR BEST NUMBER OF CONCURENTLY HELD BALLOONS multiplied by THE NUMBER OF SECONDS YOU'VE SURVIVED (time starts when you collect your FIRST BALLOON)

I probably don't need to tell you to avoid the whacking-great SPACE-SAWS, do I?
